name: PE-PE-Penguin Polar Ranger!
description:
Development Time: 4 Weeks Overview:

PE-PE Penguin Polar Ranger! is a 3D third-person game. The player will control a penguin named Pe-Pe to explore the ice land, destroy all the pollution sources, and clean up her beloved homeland. 

Goal: Accept quests, find all the pollution sources and destroy them.  Controls(keyboard): KEYBOARD & MOUSE:

WASD: Move

Shift: Boost

E: Interact

Space: Jump

Esc: Pause Game 

Mouse Pointer: Change Camera Angle

Controller

Left Joystick: Move

Left Trigger: Boost

Button West: Interact

Button South: Jump

Start: Pause Game

Right Stick: Change Camera Angle

Creators:

Cesar Nazario: Programming

Evelyn You: 2D Art/UI Design/Webpage Design

Gavin Guan: Programming/Project Management 

Luke Qian: Level Art/Level Design

Moulya Paramesh: 3D Art/Rigging/Animation

Documentation:
